title: Holy Fuck
overview: An extreme tantra school shows up at Ängsbacka, a course centre in Värmland, in 2010. The leader of the school propagated that one would explore one's boundaries and experiment with sex to reach divinity. We meet some of those who joined and came to end up high in the hierarchy in what would become Europe's largest tantra school. Now they are talking openly about what they have been up to.
